dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1722 IS: Salary Collection Regulatory Relief Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Rounds introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to repeal certain additional disclosure requirements, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Salary Collection Regulatory Relief Act.

Section 953(b) of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (15 U.S.C. 78l note) is hereby repealed and any regulations issued pursuant to such subsection shall have no force or effect.
